page.title: 09RECREATION IN MARFORD (CONT)
page.content: Marford Community Centre holds disco's,parties,sport presentations and all sorts of meetings,etc.It was opened in 1984 and is used throughout Marford. Hoseley Lane Model Race-Track is used on Sunday mornings.People come with remote control cars and race them around the track.People enjoy the race-track and their model cars. Wynnstay Lane Playing Field,(commonly called the Gravel Pit,)holds Sports Days,School Cricket and Foot-ball matches,childrens picnics and things like that.People use this land well and have good use of it.In the Summer it is open all day for anyone to go there.
